name: Sales Pitch
description:
Have you ever stumbled your way through a presentation? Of course you have, and this game is made so you can relive that experience with these two lovely ladies who are suddendly doing a sales pitch with no idea about what's going on.

This is a very basic point and click made in 10 hours for Ludum Dare 31 with the theme "Entire game on one screen". There's typos and all that because we didn't have time to proofread, but we'll fix that, someday.

Use the mouse to point the objects and the spacebar to advance through the text. You can zoom-in the window by pressing the number keys (from 1 to 5) or go full-screen with alt+enter.

Rate this game in LD!

Programming/Writing: @ironiclark

Graphics/Design: @kiririn51
